channel.title: Server School on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Server School on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: The final solution
item.description: Well. we fuxored up the ssh server like it has never seen. So we fixed it up something fierce. Actually we schooled the ssh server. It tought it was all surley. But NOOOOOO.. hehe. well now I can do web work.. someday..
